comment: BORING, Must attend, teaches straight from book word for word. Tests are easy just fill out study guide. just sucks b/c attendance is mandatory.
He wastes 8 minutes each class just saying the word "um" and "with respect to". lol.

EASIEST A ever. Attendance is not mandatory; however an assignment=attendance consisting of 15 questions is due every class. DO THEM, & DO THEM RIGHT. Go to class turn in assignment Then you can pretty much leave. He doesn?t care if you get up and walk out during the lecture.he is boring. The test are copied and pasted from the questions sets.

EASIEST A ever. Attendance is not mandatory; however an assignment consisting of 15 questions is due every class. DO THEM, & DO THEM RIGHT. Team up with classmates to ?check answers.? Every class, you NEED to go turn in your questions sets (=attendance) AND collect the graded ones (to study for test). Then you can pretty much leave. ...continued..

He doesn?t care if you get up and walk out during the lecture. By the end of my semester half of the class would leave. He?ll never say a word. & you?ll want to leavehe is boring. The test are copied and pasted from the questions sets. Just memorize the right answer and you?ll recognize it on the test it will take 10 min. Great GPA and Hope booster

This was probally one of the worst classes Ive ever endured.  Lectures were unbelieveably boring, long, and almost impossible to listen to due to the 5000 umms or uhhs. Oh, and he requires attendance. The book was much more interesting than him. However, the tests were easy if you read the book.

Yes, it is true he is boring. However, this is one of the easiest classes ive taken. Heres why... if you do the homework (question sets) you have the answers to the tests he "copys and pastes" the questions from the homework into a test. grades on a point based system. people often show up turn in homework then leave.
He lectures straight from the book only less clearly. I got more from reading and taking my own notes than listening to him talk.
Very easy! Boring but easy. No papers required. Tests come straight from question sets. Do the question sets and you are good to go

BORING! Reads straight from the book PAST time to leave. People literally sleep/dip out early because its so mundane. Tests are ok if you study and know all the definitions. Requires an 8 page paper, but grades it very fairly!
HE is nice but is boring. he lectures the whole classes period which comes straight out of the book. If you read and study you'll do fine on his tests

This professor is, unfortunately, quite boring. Does nothing but lecture, and is ironically poor at speaking in front of the class. You will need your textbook, definitely. If you can memorize vocabulary and highlighted concepts, his tests will be easy but DO require some study. He makes an otherwise engaging subject boring.

Teacher is so BORING, lectures are long and class is required. He teaches directly from the textbook, all you have to do is read it. But the tests are super hard unless you study for a few hours. The final is optional and is the only easy thing about the class

I find Anthropology an interesting subject. Unfortunately, this professor was able to suck the course dry of any fun. Unlike other teachers in the department, he doesn't allow students to present on the different subjects and has hard tests. Class discussion is kept to a minimum to allow for his lecture, which often digresses from the topic.
